title: Close button moves down when view resized smaller
description: The close button and the pulldown menu icon (triangle) move below the label when a view, such as the Navigator, is resized smaller. This behavior is observed on Linux, running build 20011127, but not on build 20011116 on Nt2000. It is important to note that this movement may confuse users.
OB: On Linux, running build 20011127, when a view like the Navigator is resized smaller, the close button and the pulldown menu icon (triangle) move below the label.
EB: The close button and the pulldown menu icon (triangle) should remain aligned with the label even when the view is resized smaller.
SR:
1. Launch the application on Linux, running build 20011127. 
2. Open a view, such as the Navigator. 
3. Resize the view to make it smaller. 
4. Observe the position of the close button and the pulldown menu icon (triangle) in relation to the label.
